page.title: 01Overview Bickleigh/Wotter
page.content: A steep sided river valley divides the upland.Much of the area is forested or farms.Most of the population is in a commando camp and two small villages.The latter are not typical of rural Devon being heavily influenced by feudalism and industrial paternalism.There is a small incursion of moorland,some derelict spoil heaps and china clay mica pans.
